This game is incredible. I've played for a few weeks now, and I love it. They're changing up the way people get matched with others online, so I've had some really bad matches on the Survivor and Killer side since the Sept. 13 reset
jogo muito viciante, porém alguns personagens desbalanciados.

Oyunun konsepti, içeriği vs. çok güzel düşünülmüş ve çok zevkli hale getirilmiş. Bu düşüncem katil tarafı için geçerli. Kurban tarafı biraz tek düze geldi bana ve pek eğlenemedim. Oyunda beni irite eden bazı sorunlar var ve bundan dolayı katilde rank 1 olup oyunu bırakmayı düşünüyorum.
1) Oyun genel anlamda pay to play durumuna gelmiş. Her ne kadar çoğu karakter oyun parası ile de açılsa ilk karakterinizi açmanız için gereken oyun parasına 200 küsur maç sonunda ulaşıyorsunuz ve bu durum beni oyundan kopardı. Bir zaman sonra afk bırakıp level kasmaya itti beni.
2) Oyunda kitaplar şeklinde bir bölüm var ve oradaki görevleri yapınca kan puanı ve sezon bileti ilerlemesi kazanıyorsunuz. Çok güzel düşünülmüş ama e be kardeşim kitap bölümleri sonundaki ödüller ne öyle? Hayatımda yüzüne bakmayacağım muskaları veriyor. Hiçbir değeri yok benim için. Çok mu zor oralara basit de olsa karakter skini vs. koymak? Umacı adlı katilin kafasında mavi ve sarı izi olan skinleri var. Gidin bi kitabın sonuna da kırmızı izlisini koyun. Çok basit bir skin ama o saçma muskalardan bin kat daha güzel.
3) Prestij diye bir olay var. Karakteriniz 50 level olunca gidip prestij seçeneğini seçerseniz karakterinizin perkleri vs. sıfırlanıyor ve size bir skin veriyor. Maalesef bu skin de kişiyi prestij seçeneğini tercih ettirecek kadar güzel bir skin değil. Daha farklı ve güzel şeyler verilebilirdi.
4) Oyunda aylık olarak ranklar sıfırlanıyor ve rank 1 isem bana verilen kan puanı benim 5 maçta kazandığım kan puanı kadar. Yani bir aylık rank sisteminin ödülünü ben bir günde az bir vaktimi harcayarak kazanabiliyorum.
Kısaca oyuna güzel sistemler getirmişler. Ancak içini dolduramamışlar hatta çuvallamışlar. Özellikle bu karakter açma olayı beni çok gıcık etti. İlk karakterimi açamadan oyundaki en yüksek ranka ulaştım. Mantıksızlık diz boyu. Bunların dışında oyun çok güzel. Ama yüzlerce saatimi verecek kadar içine çekemedi beni yukarıda saydığım saçmalıklardan dolayı. Ufak tefek değişiklikler yaparak insanları daha çok oyunda tutabilirdiler...

I have played this game since beta. Game has been out for about what 6 years? After every patch that came out, the game breaks in some way. Alot of bugs reappear or new ones show up. Curious on what is the purpose of having PTB if they do not fix the bugs before they release it. In terms of playstyle survivors and killers mostly use the same 4-6 perks. The rest are bad. As for the new ranking system, it is nice that they finally reward you with something instead of nothing back then BUT the new mmr system is horrible! If you solo queue or even with 1 other player, you will run into potatoes. Potatoes are players that walk around the edge of the map and goes down within 10 secs. While you are being chased you would think others are working on gens but nope just wandering around. Killers have been camping hooks and tunneling hard! It seems like everyone is playing different but not in a good way. Also the disconnects are insane!!! Once someone goes down bam instant disconnect. Game is in rough shape and now the amount of hackers there are just kills the game even more.
I thought this game was kinda cool, but it is just very boring
muito divertido tmj porem, há muitos hackers

As fun an addicting the game is, the developers are very on and off with communication with their players- especially on console. There are so many bugs and issues that make the game unplayable, down to no graphic settings to control besides in-game (no resolution choices, no max fps, etc), maps being constantly turned on and off to fix issues, a really unrewarding Tome system that acts just like a Fortnite battle pass minus the value, and a non-functional anti-cheat, it'll be hard to defend Behavior until a real competitor steps up and makes the team [b]really[/b] care about the game
всё отлично, игра очень хорошая , очень её люблю, скачивайте все и радуйтесь жизни, это будет одна из ваших самых любимый игр, даже если вы любитель горилл - она вам понравится

I love everything about this game.

Nie wiem nawet od czego zacząć XD Ta gra jest tak beznadziejna, że czasami muszę ją odinstalować. Pomijając fakt ciągłych bezsensownych aktualizacji, które trwają (jak na ich treść) długo - zupełnie nic nie dają. Mam wrażenie, że są tylko po to, żeby następnego dnia dostać informację o tym, że kolejna mapa jest niedostępna z powodu błędów. Kolejkowanie jest jeszcze gorsze niż było (twórcy pomyśleli, że hej! jeśli queue jest tak złe to co wy na to, żeby wyzerować rangi WSZYSTKIM do 0? To brzmi jak świetny plan, prawda?) :)). Ilość camperów jest astronomiczna, przez co gry coraz częściej kończą się na dc większości surv i zdobyciu marnej ilości pkt przez samego campera. BTW Moi ulubieni camperzy to ci, który wydali pieniądze na dodatek, kupili sobie skina, założyli swój najlepszy zestaw perków, tylko po to, żeby cie facecampić za 7k pkt <3.  Myślę, jeśli chodzi o sam gameplay to raczej nic zbyt szybko się nie zmieni, a szkoda, bo kiedy trafiam na dobrego killera i fajną drużynę, to jakoś od razu mam ochotę na kolejne rundy.  Gra w całokształcie zachowuje się gorzej niż niektóre darmowe gry, nie polecam ~ Robert Makłowicz

Update z dnia 26.07.22r
Jest jeszcze gorzej niż było. Myślałam, że bardziej zjebać się już nie da, a jednak. Przechodzę powoli na inne gry (np. VHS), żeby DBD mogło sobie umrzeć w mojej bibliotece :33.

Each new killer the devs add seem to be more broken than the last with the most recent, having a combo that makes the match unplayable. Not a fun game anymore. Fix it devs

PRZEPIS NA BIGOS!!!MNIAM
500 g mięsa wieprzowego (np. karkówki)
200 g kiełbasy
1 cebula
2 łyżki oleju roślinnego
3 szklanki bulionu lub wody
30 g suszonych borowików
2 łyżki powideł śliwkowych lub kilka suszonych śliwek
1 jabłko (np. reneta lub antonówka) - opcjonalnie
1 kg kiszonej kapusty
1 łyżka koncentratu pomidorowego
1 łyżka mąki
1 łyżka masła
PRZYPRAWY
1 listek laurowy, 2 ziela angielskie, 1 łyżeczka kminku, 1 łyżka majeranku
PRZYGOTOWANIE
Mięso pokroić w kostkę. Cebulę pokroić w kosteczkę i zeszklić na oleju w dużym garnku. Dodać mięso i dokładnie je obsmażyć.
Wlać 2 szklanki gorącego bulionu lub wody z solą i pieprzem, zagotować. Następnie dodać połamane suszone grzyby, przykryć, zmniejszyć ogień i gotować przez ok. 45 minut.
Dodać listek laurowy, ziela angielskie, kminek, majeranek, powidła śliwkowe lub posiekane śliwki, obrane i pokrojone w kosteczkę obrane jabłko i wymieszać.
Dodać odciśniętą kiszoną kapustę oraz wlać szklankę wody, wymieszać. Przykryć i gotować przez ok. 15 minut.
Kiełbasę obrać ze skóry, pokroić w kostkę i podsmażyć na patelni. Dodać do kapusty i gotować przez ok. 30 minut. Pod koniec dodać koncentrat pomidorowy.
Mąkę podsmażyć na suchej patelni, gdy zacznie brązowieć dodać łyżkę masła i mieszać aż masło się rozpuści.
Trzymając patelnię na ogniu dodać stopniowo kilka łyżek kapusty cały czas mieszając. Przełożyć zawartość patelni z powrotem do garnka, wymieszać i zagotować.
 
WSKAZÓWKI
Jeśli używamy kiełbasy wiejskiej, kruchej, to nie musimy jej wcześniej podsmażać.

Esse jogo assim como todo multiplayer te deixa num ciclo que você começa a jogar feliz e termina triste e com raiva, se questionando todas as suas escolhas de vida. Mas mesmo assim você volta a jogar no dia seguinte. Super recomendo.

Dead by Daylight (Made by Behavior Interactive) is a good game, but it probably isn't what you would expect. 
But let us start at the beginning.

Graphic: I played this game with all graphic settings on maximum and it's ok. Just a few minor issues with the reselution, but the Steam screenshots of the game are not as high quality as it is in game, but the graphic is alright.

Mechanically: Mechanic wise it runs very good, i didn't encounter any bugs or glitches. In some videos on Youtube you can find people finding bugs with the map designs but i personally didn't found any. The controls are also functional and easy to play with.

Horror: Now the game is good, but I didn't expect it to be like that. The game is not scary, it rather makes you scared with panic with fast comming, loud music. But here is the problem with that. After your first games, the panic doesn't work anymore, since you know what will happen. It's like a horror movie that you see over and over again, after seeing it so many times it's just not scary anymore, and when it's with an online game, which you can play as often as you want, it loses it's spookyness pretty quick.

Gameplay: The gameplay definetly makes up for the bad horror. It's fun and has a lot of replayabilty. So, in the game you can play as either Killer or Survivor, and the goal for the Killer is to kille the 4 Survivor by either: Hooking them (that's the most common kill), letting them bleed out (sluging), or performing a "Memento-Mori", which is when you kill a player with a special animation. Also each Killer has a diffrent power which they can apply add-on's to. 

The Survivors goal is to repair 5 generators and open the exit gate, while bieng chased by the Killer. The Survivor have a few ways to run away from the killer, by either: putting a pallet down which you can slide over, which the Killer can also break, but takes a bit of time (It can also stun the Killer when putting the pallet down right in front of them), jumping through a window, or "looping them" with a combination of pallets, windows and walls. The Survivors also have to unhook other Survivors (A Survivor can only be hooked twice before the next hook resultes in a death). Survivors can also carry item's which they also can apply add-on's to.

But it makes it so fun, because of the perks. These are special enhancements with diffrent affects. Both Killer and Survivor can have 4 of them equiped. These differentiate between normal and personal perks. normal perks are perks that can either have every Survivor or every Killer. Then there are the personal perks which can only be equiped by the character possesing these. But you can also make them to teachable perks, which then all characters can unlock. These perks can be unlocked by leveling up the bloodweb of a character, which also unlocks items and add-on's for the character. The bloodweb can be leveld up by investing bloodpoint, which you get after every round of playing. You can also bring an offering to a match, which can do a variety of thing. From sending you to a specific map, to increasing the bloodpoints gathering.

DLC's: I have bought 2 DLC's: The Ghostface, and the Stranger Thing's Chapter. A normal DLC consists of 1 Killer and 1 Survivor. There are 2 variations of DLC's: Original and licensed DLC's. An Original DLC can be bought with Money or by farming many "Shards", which you get by leveling up your player level (You can also use them to buy perks at the "Shrine of Secrets" which updates itself every week). Then there are licensec DLC's that you can only buy with real money.

Community: Here comes the worst thing about Dead by Daylight, it's community...
If you want to play this game, prepare for lot's of toxicity and insults. Expesially the Survivors are really toxic. You see...there are dumb rules made by the community. Like if you hook a survivor, they get unhooked and you chase the unhooked person, you are a "tunneler", because you kill a person...
And guess what, these sort of rules don't exist for killers. The Survivors are so toxic, that they go out of the way to go to your steam profile, and leave a comment how bad you are for plaing the game how it should be played.

Conclusion: The game is great even with it's often awful community. For 20$ (On Steam) it really is a good investment. It is really fun, especially with friends. I recomend playing it and not letting the toxicity hinder you from it.

Игра, в стиле хоррор (ну да..), вышедшая в 2016 году, с которой лично я познакомилась всего лишь пару недель (ну бывает))
Впечатления об игре двоякие. 
С одной стороны, это отличная игра, даже веселая, как такового хоррор жанра я не прочувствовала (если не брать в расчет, когда остаешься 1х1 с маньяком, то сердечко шалить начинает) С друзьями играть вечером перед сном пару часиков одно удовольствие, а уж если с опытными друзьями, то так вообще сказка:D 
С другой стороны, баланс такой себе, конечно. Иногда попадаются лютые маньяки, которые, как-будто, одним местом чувствуют тебя абсолютно везде, где бы ты не находился. 
Баги вообще отдельная тема) Ну , впрочем, это во всех играх почти так- одно чинят, другое ломают)

В общем, рекомендую для тех, кто хочет расслабиться с друзьями, коллегами, просто рандомными ребятками вечерком, убивая драгоценные часы сна)
